availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2012.11
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor mauscript. Corrections and additions still need to be made and await a collation comparision of available manuscriptwitnesses. A transcription of the Sorbonne manuscript still awaits completion. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still await construction.
